name: kyoo
description: Kyoo is a self hosted video server built with a focus on anime and TV series. It scans libraries, pulls metadata and lets users browse and stream content from a responsive web front end tailored to large episodic collections.
features: Video Streaming: Stream anime, TV series, and movies from self-hosted library. Your personal streaming server.
Library Scanning: Automatic media library scanning with metadata fetching. Organize content effortlessly.
Metadata Integration: Fetch information from TMDb, AniList, and other sources. Rich content details.
Episode Tracking: Track watch progress for episodic content automatically. Resume where you left off.
Web Player: Modern, responsive video player with subtitle support. Watch on any device.
Mobile Apps: Native Android app for mobile viewing. Stream on the go.
Multi-User: Individual user accounts with separate watch history. Share library with family.
Collections: Organize content into custom collections and playlists. Curate viewing experience.
Search & Filter: Find content quickly with advanced search and filters. Navigate large libraries.
Transcoding: On-the-fly video transcoding for compatibility. Play on any device.
Subtitle Support: Multiple subtitle tracks with customizable appearance. Watch in any language.
Continue Watching: Quick access to in-progress content from homepage. Resume viewing easily.
